Package org.wise.portal.presentation.web.controllers.teacher.management

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatchStudentChangePasswordController  
    ChangeStudentPeriodController  
    ChangeUserPasswordController  
    ChangeWorkgroupController  
    ClassroomRunListController
    Puts run details into the model to be retrieved and displayed for logged-in teacher
    LibraryController
    Controller for WISE Project library pages (for anonymous users and teachers)
    ListStudentNamesController  
    RemoveStudentFromRunController
    Controller for removing students from Run, thereby removing any association the student has with the run and its teacher, as well as their work.
    StudentListController
    Controller for printing a list of students in a project run.
    SubmitWorkgroupChangesController
    Controller for making changes to student workgroups
    ViewMyStudentsController
    Controller for displaying students in the run
